# Assemble

```{r}

figure_s6_a1 <- ggarrange(
  
  ncol = 5,
  widths = c(1,1,1,1.8, 0.2),
  plot_a1,
  plot_a2,
  plot_a3,
  plot_a4
)

figure_s6_a1

ggsave("images/figure_s6_a1.png",
  figure_s6_a1,
  width = 17*0.787402,
  height = 4.8*0.787402,
  units = c("in"),
  dpi = 300)

```
